byline.contributor: Elizabeth A. Harris and Kate Taylor contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo reaches deal with New York State legislators on state budget, ending weeks of negotiation; new measures include education reforms and ethics policies; budget is fifth in a row to be passed on time.
lead_paragraph: The agreement, reached by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and legislative leaders, includes several new ethics measures that the governor had proposed in response to corruption scandals in Albany.

headline.main: Deal Is Reached on New York State Budget; Ethics Measures Are Included
headline.print_headline: Deal Is Reached on State Budget; Measures on Ethics Are Included

snippet: The agreement, reached by Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and legislative leaders, includes several new ethics measures that the governor had proposed in response to corruption scandals in Albany.
